title: 37 Low-Calorie Dinner Recipes - Easy and Delicious Low Calorie Recipes
description: For health conscious and diet conscious individuals, it is highly recommended to follow some low calorie dinner recipes. You donâ€™t have to skip your dinner because you can prepare healthy meals that have less than 300 calories per serving. All recipes are prepared by expert gourmet cook and nutrition experts to give you tasty, low calorie, nutritious dinner every day. Aside from that, the recipes are easy to prepare and easy to follow. You can now enjoy your dinners without worrying of excess daily calorie intake. Here is just some of what you will learn how to * Spicy Oven-Baked * Salmon Cakes Top with Creamy Ginger and Sesame Sauce * Double-Smoked Salmon and Horseradish Cream * Baked Chicken and Red Pepper Sauce * Rice Stuffed Peppers with Chicken * Seafood Lasagna * Pork Chops Top with Blue Cheese and Walnuts * Turkey Breast and Mustard Sage Crumbs * Fiesta Chicken * Bulgur-Stuffed * Minty Lamb Chops Roasted * Potatoes and Pork * Chicken Papusas with Shrimp * Smoked Salmon with Lemon * Bacon & Spinach Omelet * Garlic & Clams Spaghetti * Stir-Fried Shrimp and Honey Walnuts * Shark, Shrimp and Broccoli * Skirt Steak with Mushroom Gravy * Honey Bourbon Salmon Recipe * Penne and Vodka Sauce * Flank Steak - Grilled or BroiledAnd much, much more! 37 Easy and Delicious Low Calorie Dinner Recipes!
author: Cooking Penguin
